epicoffee A call for coffee

kopi vendor

03 Mar 2016

This is a typical ‘mobile’ coffee vendor in Jakarta, they will bring a lot of coffee in a sachet continer, and also couple of hot water jug, they will serve a hot coffee on the go for people who need it. the coffee brand is ranged from Kapal Api, ABC and also so-called white-coffee.
